All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDao<T extends DbEntity>
    Base abstract implementation of Data access object pattern.
    ActionCommand
    Web action command interface.
    AddBookCommand
    Executes command that is add new book to add new Book based on request values.
    AddCommentCommand
    Executes command that is add new Comment to Book.
    AddCopyCommand
    Executes command that is add one copy of definite saved Book instance.
    AddLikeCommand
    Executes command that is add new Like to Book from User.
    ApplicationLifecycleListener
    Listener to initialize and destroy connection pool.
    ApproveOrderCommand
    Executes command that is Approve book order that user makes.
    Book
    Entity that represents book in application.
    BookDao
    Book Data access object interface for dao layer.
    BookService
    Service interface for service layer that defines Book service behavior.
    BookValidationTest  
    ChangeLoginCommand
    Executes command that is change saved User login.
    ChangePasswordCommand
    Executes command that is change saved User password in database table.
    CommandEnum
    Enumeration that contains all commands implementations.
    CommandFactory
    Factory class that defines command that user wants to execute finds command instance in CommandEnum.
    CommandManager
    Utility class that finds commands properties file and returns commands by passed key.
    Comment
    Entity that represents book comment.
    CommentDao
    Comment entity data access object for dao layer.
    CommentService
    Service interface for service layer that defines Comment service behavior.
    CommentValidationTest  
    ConnectionActionException
    Connection pool layer exception.
    ConnectionPool
    Connection Pool interface manages retrieving and returning connections.
    ConnectionPoolInitializationException
    Exception for connection pool layer.
    ConnectionPoolProperties
    Class contains connection pool properties from properties file.
    Controller
    Main servlet that is application controller and performs controller function.
    Dao<T extends DbEntity>
    Data access object base interface for dao layer.
    DAOException
    Exception for Data access object layer.
    DAOFactory
    Data access object factory interface.
    DateTag
    Custom date tag that show current date in application.
    DbEntity
    Interface defines saved in database entity behavior.
    DeleteAccountCommand
    Executes command that is delete save User from database table.
    DeleteBookCommand
    Executes command that is delete Book instance from database book table.
    DeleteCommentCommand
    Executes command that is delete saved Comment from database table.
    DeleteOrderCommand
    Executes command that is delete Order from database table.
    DemoteRoleCommand
    Executes command that is Demote saved user role.
    FindBookByGenreCommand
    Command that finds saved books by genre that was passed by client and returns find result and forms message
    FindBookByNameCommand
    Command that finds Book by entered name.
    Genre
    Represents book genre.
    Like
    Entity that represents like that user add to book.
    LikeDao
    Like entity data access object interface for dao layer. extends Dao base interface
    LikeService
    Service interface for service layer that defines Like service behavior.
    LocalDateFormatter
    Makes local date formatting for jsp page.
    LoginCommand
    Executes command that is validation login data and login user.
    LogoutCommand
    Executes command that is log out user.
    MainCommand
    Executes command that is forward to main page.
    MessageManager
    Utility class that finds messages class based on current default locale and returns messages from it by passed key

    Order
    Entity that represents book order.
    OrderBookCommand
    Executes command that is make book order by user and save it in database table.
    OrderDao
    Order data access object interface for dao layer.
    OrderService
    Service interface for service layer that defines Order service behavior.
    OrdinaryConnectionPoolTest  
    PathManager
    Utility class that finds resource file that contains all page paths and returns them by passed key.
    PermissionFilter
    Filter make command permission checking.
    PromoteRoleCommand
    Executes command that is promote user role.
    RegisterCommand
    Executes command that is validation user register data and register new user.
    RemoveCopyCommand
    Executes command that is remove one copy of saved Book instance.
    ReturnBookCommand
    Executes command that is returned ordered by user book.
    Service<T extends DbEntity>
    Service interface for service layer that defines service layer behavior.
    ServiceException
    Service layer exception.
    SetLanguageCommand
    Executes command that is set user language (english, russian, chinese, indian or arabic).
    SetSubscriptionCommand
    Executes command that is set Subscription to definite User.
    ShowAccountCommand
    Executes command that is forward to account page.
    ShowBooksListCommand
    Executes command that is get books and forward to books page.
    ShowLoginCommand
    Executes command that is forward to login page.
    ShowOrdersListCommand
    Executes command that is form orders page and make path for forward to orders page.
    ShowRegisterCommand
    Executes command that is form register page path to forward.
    ShowUserOrdersPageCommand
    Executes command that is form user's orders and form user orders page path to forward.
    ShowUsersListCommand
    Executes command that is find users page and form users page path to forward.

    Enumeration represents order's current status.
